page.title: 12OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES.
page.content: {Activities for young children {----------------------------- { Swimming}is the most popular, two pupils have their{own pool,}but most use the nearest sports centre in Thornbury. Seven use Almondsbury{tennis}courts and 2 learn{cricket}at The Almondsbury C.C. pitch. For all other organised sports (badminton, ice skating, squash, short tennis and table tennis)all pupils leave the village. They all{ride bikes}and most have roller skates. { MUSIC.}3 learn the piano, 3 the guitar, 7 the recorder. 1 belongs to a Saturday orchestra, 4 are in the church choir, 1 in the Almondsbury scout band. 3 are trainee bell ringers. { CLUBS.}6 are brownies, 3 girl guides, 6 cubs, and 2 scouts.
